title: Revert logout button color change (roll back to Version 34)

requirements.summary: Revert the logout button styling in the Header component and LoginButton component back to how it appeared in Version 34, undoing the dark color change that was applied in Version 35
acceptanceCriteria: The logout button in the desktop header navigation displays the same color/style as it did before the Version 35 dark color change.
The logout button in the mobile navigation displays the same color/style as it did before the Version 35 dark color change.
The LoginButton component no longer has the darker color styling introduced in Version 35.
No other UI elements are affected by this revert.

file_operations.description: Revert the logout button styling in both desktop and mobile navigation sections to match Version 34. Remove any dark color classes (e.g., bg-gray-800, bg-gray-700, text-gray-200) applied in Version 35 and restore the original lighter styling that was present in Version 34. Ensure both the desktop nav link and mobile nav button for logout are reverted.

Revert the logout button styling to match Version 34. Remove the darker color scheme (likely bg-gray-800/700 or similar dark classes) introduced in Version 35 from the logout button state. Restore the original Version 34 styling which likely used lighter colors such as bg-gray-200 with hover:bg-gray-300 and text-gray-800 for the logout state.
